Ancient Religions in Contact: Contemporary Religious Phenomena and Their Ancient Predecessors home about authors

Author Page

  • Jens Schlamelcher

    jensSchla

    Jens is an Ethnologist of religion and interested in contemporary religious developments and theories. Together with Rosel Pientka-Hinz and Thomas Jurczyk, he is leading the ARELINCO project.

  • Rosel Pientka-Hinz

    rosel

    Rosel is interested in ancient Oriental religions and the history of religious notions. Together with Thomas Jurczyk and Jens Schlamelcher, she is leading the ARELINCO project.

  • Thomas Jurczyk

    thomasJ

    Thomas is interested in Greco-Roman religions, digital humanities, and the history of religious notions. Together with Rosel Pientka-Hinz and Jens Schlamelcher, he is leading the ARELINCO project.
